info.title: Exchange Rates API
info.description: Exchange Rates API for retrieving daily, weekly, biweekly, and monthly currency exchange rates from official sources (central banks, tax authorities). Visit our website to find up-to-date information on the supported data sources and detailed API features.

get.summary: Returns the latest available exchange rates. (Auth policies: RequireBankSubscription)

parameters.name: currencies
parameters.description: The currencies to return. If no currencies are provided, all available currencies will be included in the results.

parameters.name: priceType
parameters.description: The requested price type. Defaults to mid.

parameters.name: includeObsoleteCurrencies
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether obsolete currencies should be included in the results. Defaults to false.

Retry-After.description: Indicates how long to wait before making a new request

schema.description: Indicates how long to wait before making a new request

X-Rate-Limit-Limit.description: The rate limit period that is applicable for the current request (eg. 1m, 12h, 1d)

schema.description: The rate limit period that is applicable for the current request (eg. 1m, 12h, 1d)

X-Rate-Limit-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the current rate-limit window

schema.description: The number of requests left for the current rate-limit window

X-Rate-Limit-Reset.description: UTC date time (ISO 8601) when the rate limit resets

schema.description: UTC date time (ISO 8601) when the rate limit resets

sampleFileText.summary: The text representation of a sample XML file
sampleFileText.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ExchangeRates xmlns="http://schemas.fluentax.com/ExchangeRates/1.0/ExchangeRates">
   <BankId>NOCB</BankId>
   <BaseCurrency>NOK</BaseCurrency>
   <QuoteType>Direct</QuoteType>
   <Rates effectiveDate="2020-09-24">
      <Rate currency="CHF" value="1030.66" unitMultiplier="2" />
      <Rate currency="CNY" value="139.6" unitMultiplier="2" />
      <Rate currency="EUR" value="11.1023" />
      <Rate currency="USD" value="9.534" />
   </Rates>
</ExchangeRates>

get.summary: Returns the exchange rates for the current month (in UTC time) exported into the given file format. (Auth policies: RequireBankSubscription)

parameters.name: currencies
parameters.description: The currencies to return. If no currencies are provided, all available currencies will be included in the results.

parameters.name: priceType
parameters.description: The requested price type. Defaults to mid.

parameters.name: includeObsoleteCurrencies
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether obsolete currencies should be included in the results. Defaults to false.
